name: start_shipping_portfolio_tool
description: Generate a comprehensive plan for creating a modern, professional portfolio website. This tool will outline the structure, design elements, and content strategy to effectively showcase the individual's skills, projects, and achievements.

person_name.description: Full name or professional alias of the person for whom the portfolio is being created

portfolio_description.description: A detailed description of the portfolio's purpose, including the individual's professional background, key skills, notable achievements, and target audience (e.g., potential employers, clients, collaborators)

sections.description: Key sections to be included in the portfolio, such as About Me, Skills, Projects, Work Experience, Education, Testimonials, Contact Form, etc. Specify any unique sections relevant to the individual's field.

design_style.description: The desired visual style and aesthetic for the portfolio. Include preferences for color scheme, typography, layout (e.g., single-page or multi-page), and overall mood (e.g., minimalist, creative, corporate, tech-focused).
